attributes.action: ensure that Kate and Gerry McCann receive British standards of justice from the Portuguese judicial system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of Britons take the highest standards of justice for granted in the United Kingdom.  The Prime Minister is petitioned to ensure that Kate and Gerry McCann receive treatment under the Portuguese justice system which is equal to the transparency and fairness of British justice.  The whole British population agonises with the McCanns and must be in no doubt that the treatment they receive is scrupulously proper and fair and that no miscarriage of justice can take place.  The constant and continual scrutiny by the British Government in this dreadful matter is vital and essential.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
